owl:Ontology.rdfs:label: Compound Measure Description
owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: This document is a vocabulary to describe compound measures, i.e. measures with several metric or item that are organized with serveral dimensions. The description of such a measure relies on a Tree-Structure of Requirement (TSoR): a set of requirements structured hierarchicaly with analysis element. A TSoR represents the main measure. Several information may be added to explicitely indicate how the overall score on the measure should be calculated based on the hierarchy, relative importance of the node of the hierarchy and an aggregation function. The measure can be described completely and unambiguously from the organisation to the requirements and the implementation.
owl:Ontology.dc:creator: Jennie Andersen

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: TSoR: Tree-Structure of Requirements
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Defines a compound measure with a set of requirements as well as a structuration of these requirements through the use of analysis elements.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Analysis Element
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Node of the tree structure to classify requirements.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Requirement
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Node of the tree structure representing a given metric to evaluate a concrete element.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Implementation
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: An implementation describing a procedure and/or an executable document. Can either be expressed in a query language, or be refering to an executable file, or be precisly describing the procedure.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has root
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The TSoR has a given root among the analysis element.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is specified by
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Structures analysis elements through this relation. An analysis element is specified by one or more other analysis elements that detail the analysis.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: expects
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Associate a requirement with an analysis element: an analysis element expects a requirement.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: represents
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A node of a TSoR represents a given concept or metric.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is implemented by
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A requirement is implemented by an implementation.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: weight
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number representing the relative importance of one node (analysis element or requirement) of a TSoR compared to its siblings.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: aggregation function
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Definition of a function expressing how to compute a unique global score based on the result obtained on each requirements and their weight.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: implementation quality
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Numerical indicator between 0 and 1 representing the quality of the implementation of a given requirement. 0 means it implements the requirement very poorly, 1 means it is almost perfect.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is followed by
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: An implementation is followed by another implementation if the the second complement the first one.
